item.title: When is the Next Season in ARC Raiders? New Raider Deck Date Explained
item.content:encoded:
ARC Raiders is a stunning, post-apocalyptic extraction shooter with immense potential. It has become one of 2025’s most successful games and is, by numbers, the best-received extraction shooter ever made. In this guide, we’re looking at a portion of the game’s post-launch support model and determining when the next ARC Raiders season and Raider Deck are set to arrive.

If you’re waiting for more free rewards in ARC Raiders via the Raider Deck, read on to find out when it’s coming to the game.

When is the New Raider Deck Coming to ARC Raiders?

The next Raider Deck will unlock in ARC Raiders in December alongside the Cold Snap update. This update is set to bring a new map condition called Snowfall, introduce a special event called Flickering Flames, close the Expedition window, and introduce new quests.

This supersized update will be free to download and enjoy, with Embark Studios delivering on the promise to support this game for the foreseeable future.

If the Raider Deck is anything like the current Raider Deck, it’ll be something special for players to chase.

To level up through the Raider Deck, you need to complete Feats to unlock ‘blue’ credits, which can then be applied to the pages bursting with rewards in the Raider Deck tab on the main menu. You’ll need to unlock a certain amount on one page before unlocking the next page, but it takes no time at all, as Feats are constantly refreshing as you complete them.

In the Raider Deck, you’ll find everything from hairstyles to outfits, and from boxes full of loot to Raider Credits. There’s a lot to unlock, which is brilliant, considering you’re not paying a penny for what’s contained in the Raider Deck.

Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server what you’re hoping for in the next Raider Deck in ARC Raiders.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that ARC Raiders has hit a new peak player count

item.title: ARC Raiders Peaks Again, 10 Days After Launch, and Beats Some Insanely Popular Games
item.content:encoded:
Despite ARC Raiders having been on the market for more than ten days, the game is still surpassing expectations and climbing on certain platforms. Hours ago, the post-apocalyptic extraction shooter managed to secure a new record on Steam, climbing to a peak of 462,488 players, beating the previous high of 416,517.

The constantly climbing peak is indicative of the quality of this game. The smash hit from Embark Studios continues to turn heads worldwide, and millions of players are flooding the accessible, welcoming platform.

ARC Raiders isn’t your typical extraction shooter. For starters, it’s a third-person shooter with heavy social aspects, and it’s designed to ideally be treated as a PvE game in many ways. It has been soaring up the charts since dropping on October 30, and it shows absolutely no signs of slowing down.

Yesterday, the game hit a peak user count of 416,517 on Steam, but in recent hours, that peak has climbed further to 462,488 players. It’s bucking trends, but this multiplayer-only shooter is getting stronger over time, rather than the player count inevitably dying out.

In terms of the record books, ARC Raiders has now beaten Helldivers 2, Sons of the Forest, Kingdom Come Deliverance 2, GTA 5, and Starfield. It’s on the cusp of topping Call of Duty, Fallout 4, and Terraria.

This is likely because ARC Raiders still isn’t completely understood by the wider gaming community, and as these users are having their eyes opened to the game’s potential, they’re finding their way into the game.

Embark Studios recently revealed a stunning roadmap for ARC Raiders that promises to keep the game stoked for the time being, but the team has suggested it wants to support ARC Raiders for a decade, which is almost unheard of in this business.

Have you started playing ARC Raiders yet? Let me know what you think about the game on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out how to open the Hidden Bunker on ARC Raiders

item.title: Complete Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory Trophy List—How To Get All Achievements & Trophies
item.content:encoded:
Assassin’s Creed Mirage’s Valley of Memory update is a supersized overhaul that comes with a stack of Trophies and Achievements that you can unlock for free. It’s a sizeable expansion that takes players to an all-new region of the 2023 open-world title, presenting them with a splinter story that Ubisoft isn’t charging a penny for.

In this guide, learn how to unlock all Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory Trophies and Achievements.

All Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory Trophies & Achievements

Fans were surprised when Ubisoft announced Valley of Memory so far after launch, as Assassin’s Creed Mirage received very little in the way of updates after launch, save for the typical New Game+ kind of content.

Here’s the full list of Trophies and Achievements in Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory:

It’s not a huge list, but considering Valley of Memory is a completely free expansion, it’s a decent list of Trophies and Achievements to chase. Fans were mostly surprised that Ubisoft decided to tack this expansion onto Assassin’s Creed Mirage, which is more than two years old at this point.

Assassin’s Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory will be released as a free-to-download update on all platforms on November 18. Let me know on the Insider Gaming Discord server if you’ll be playing the new expansion.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Techland is going back to Dying Light 2

item.title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Merch Leaks Yoshi and Bowser Jr.
item.content:encoded:
Our first look at Yoshi and Bowser Jr. from The Super Mario Galaxy Movie comes from, well, a grocery chain. The film, set to release April 3rd, 2026, has yet to get a full trailer, but the new listing may hint at it coming sooner than we thought.

Illumination and Universal Pictures went big with The Super Mario Bros. Movie back in 2022. The first film based on a Nintendo IP in decades, it became the highest-grossing video game adaptation of all time. A sequel was quickly greenlit and, earlier this year, was revealed to be called The Super Mario Galaxy Movie. Story details were thin outside of using Super Mario Galaxy, but we now have some more content from an unlikely source: slice-and-bake cookies.

First Look at Yoshi and Bowser Jr. from The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Leaked Online

The leak comes from an unlikely source: Tops Markets. The East Coast grocery chain put up a new listing for “Pillsbury The Super Mario Galaxy Shape Sugar Cookie Dough”. It’s still up, linked here, if you want to look at it, but it’s out of stock. On the box, we have the best look at Yoshi, who is at the end of The Super Mario Bros. Movie via a cracked sewer egg. His design differs a bit from his video-game counterpart with smoother texturing and flatter eyes.

On the back, there’s a fun little maze to fill out. We do get to see some of the worlds Mario and Yoshi will be traveling to, though it’s hard to tell if they come from Super Mario Galaxy or its sequel. However, one icon should be familiar to fans: Bowser Jr.’s graffiti tag. The character, the son of Bowser (played in-film by Jack Black), had yet to be revealed, so his inclusion here is all but confirming his appearance.

A trailer for The Super Mario Galaxy Movie has been rumored to come out soon, possibly with the upcoming Wicked: For Good film. With April 2026 almost here, marketing is set to start and, unfortunately for Nintendo, happened a bit too early. Regardless, we have yet to see Yoshi and Bowser Jr. in action, but it’s good to know some new faces are along for the intergalactic ride.

What do you think of Yoshi’s look in The Super Mario Galaxy Movie? Are you going to be picking up the Pillsbury cookies? When do you think the trailer will come out? Let us know in the comments and on the official Insider Gaming Discord!

For more Nintendo, check out our articles on Zelda filming and the company’s plans for more films. Don’t forget to subscribe to our weekly newsletter!

item.title: Get Stronger Every Second Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Get Stronger Every Second monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash, Strength, Multipliers and much more.

Get Stronger Every Second is a popular simulator game on Roblox that requires players to get stronger and gain more health by managing their weight and defeating enemies. This, in turn, allows players to progress through the game by destroying the map, thereby enabling them to get ahead of the competition. Although there is more than one way to go about playing Get Stronger Every Second, one thing that all players must do in common is make use of codes to get their hands on free rewards. These rewards, which can be claimed through the ‘Shop’ tab within the game, could prove to be extremely beneficial, especially to newer players just starting their Roblox journey. 

Active Get Stronger Every Second Codes

  • 500K – 15,000 Strength
  • 100K – 5,000 Cash
  • RELEASE – 3,000 Cash
  • MILLION – 30,000 Cash
  • Group – 2x Multipliers

Expired Get Stronger Every Second Codes

  • Trading
  • Ascension
  • 80KMEMBERS
  • 60KMEMBERS
  • 40KMEMBERS
  • Halloween
  • 20KMEMBERS
  • Divine
  • Evolve
  • 10KMEMBERS
  • PETUPDATE
  • 200

How To Redeem Codes In Get Stronger Every Second

Redeeming codes in most Roblox games is a fairly straightforward process, and Get Stronger Every Second is no different in that regard. The developers don’t impose any unnecessary steps on the players, which means that redeeming the codes is as simple as navigating through the game’s menus and using one of the active codes. For newer players of the game, here’s a simple step-by-step guide: 

  1. Open up Roblox and launch Get Stronger Every Second.
  2. Click on the shop icon on the left side of the screen.
  3. Click on the ‘gift’ icon on the right side of the menu box.
  4. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box that pops up.
  5. Click the ‘redeem’ button to claim your rewards.

How to get more Get Stronger Every Second codes

New codes for Get Stronger Every Second are often released during game updates or special events, meaning that they can drop at any time and without prior warning. Hence, the best way to stay on top of the releases would be to simply bookmark this page and check in every now and then. We update this page as soon as any new codes are dropped by the developers, so this article will be your one-stop-shop for all things Roblox codes.

Enjoying our Roblox games codes coverage? Check out the codes for popular games like Steal A Brainrot, Radiant Residents, and Fix It Up on Insider Gaming!

Interested in the latest developments in the world of gaming and esports? Then join the Insider Gaming Discord server and engage with the passionate community.
